      • create

        public static Subscription create(java.util.Map map)
                           throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                  AuthenticationException,
                                  InvalidRequestException,
                                  NotAllowedException,
                                  SystemException
        Creates an Subscription object using the static properties PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY as the default public and private API keys respectively.
        Parameters:
        map - a map of parameters, valid keys and types:
        java.lang.Long amount
        Amount of the payment in the smallest unit of your currency. Example: 100 = $1.00
        java.lang.String billingCycle
        How the plan is billed to the customer. Values must be AUTO (indefinitely until the customer cancels) or FIXED (a fixed number of billing cycles). [default: AUTO]
        java.lang.Integer billingCycleLimit
        The number of fixed billing cycles for a plan. Only used if the billingCycle parameter is set to FIXED. Example: 4
        java.lang.String coupon
        Coupon ID associated with the subscription
        java.lang.String currency
        Currency code (ISO-4217). Must match the currency associated with your account.
        java.lang.String customer
        Customer that is enrolling in the subscription.
        java.lang.String frequency
        Frequency of payment for the plan. Used in conjunction with frequencyPeriod. Valid values are "DAILY", "WEEKLY", "MONTHLY" and "YEARLY".
        java.lang.Integer frequencyPeriod
        Period of frequency of payment for the plan. Example: if the frequency is weekly, and periodFrequency is 2, then the subscription is billed bi-weekly.
        java.lang.String name
        Name describing subscription
        java.lang.String plan
        The ID of the plan that should be used for the subscription.
        java.lang.Integer quantity
        Quantity of the plan for the subscription. [min value: 1]
        java.lang.Integer renewalReminderLeadDays
        If set, how many days before the next billing cycle that a renewal reminder is sent to the customer. If null, then no emails are sent. Minimum value is 7 if set.
        Returns:
        a Subscription object.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException

        @Deprecated
public static Subscription create(java.lang.String publicKey,
                             java.lang.String privateKey,
                             java.util.Map map)
                           throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                  AuthenticationException,
                                  InvalidRequestException,
                                  NotAllowedException,
                                  SystemException
        Deprecated. As of release 1.1, replaced by create(Authentication, Map)
        Creates an Subscription object
        Parameters:
        publicKey - Public API key. If null, the value of static PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY will be used
        privateKey - Private API key. If null, the value of static PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY will be used
        map - a map of parameters, valid keys and types:
        java.lang.Long amount
        Amount of the payment in the smallest unit of your currency. Example: 100 = $1.00
        java.lang.String billingCycle
        How the plan is billed to the customer. Values must be AUTO (indefinitely until the customer cancels) or FIXED (a fixed number of billing cycles). [default: AUTO]
        java.lang.Integer billingCycleLimit
        The number of fixed billing cycles for a plan. Only used if the billingCycle parameter is set to FIXED. Example: 4
        java.lang.String coupon
        Coupon ID associated with the subscription
        java.lang.String currency
        Currency code (ISO-4217). Must match the currency associated with your account.
        java.lang.String customer
        Customer that is enrolling in the subscription.
        java.lang.String frequency
        Frequency of payment for the plan. Used in conjunction with frequencyPeriod. Valid values are "DAILY", "WEEKLY", "MONTHLY" and "YEARLY".
        java.lang.Integer frequencyPeriod
        Period of frequency of payment for the plan. Example: if the frequency is weekly, and periodFrequency is 2, then the subscription is billed bi-weekly.
        java.lang.String name
        Name describing subscription
        java.lang.String plan
        The ID of the plan that should be used for the subscription.
        java.lang.Integer quantity
        Quantity of the plan for the subscription. [min value: 1]
        java.lang.Integer renewalReminderLeadDays
        If set, how many days before the next billing cycle that a renewal reminder is sent to the customer. If null, then no emails are sent. Minimum value is 7 if set.
        Returns:
        a Subscription object.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException

      • create

        public static Subscription create(Authentication auth,
                  java.util.Map map)
                           throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                  AuthenticationException,
                                  InvalidRequestException,
                                  NotAllowedException,
                                  SystemException
        Creates an Subscription object
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication object representing overrides for PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY and PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and/or passing an access token in for operations using OAuth.
        privateKey - Private API key. If null, the value of static PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY will be used
        map - a map of parameters, valid keys and types:
        java.lang.Long amount
        Amount of the payment in the smallest unit of your currency. Example: 100 = $1.00
        java.lang.String billingCycle
        How the plan is billed to the customer. Values must be AUTO (indefinitely until the customer cancels) or FIXED (a fixed number of billing cycles). [default: AUTO]
        java.lang.Integer billingCycleLimit
        The number of fixed billing cycles for a plan. Only used if the billingCycle parameter is set to FIXED. Example: 4
        java.lang.String coupon
        Coupon ID associated with the subscription
        java.lang.String currency
        Currency code (ISO-4217). Must match the currency associated with your account.
        java.lang.String customer
        Customer that is enrolling in the subscription.
        java.lang.String frequency
        Frequency of payment for the plan. Used in conjunction with frequencyPeriod. Valid values are "DAILY", "WEEKLY", "MONTHLY" and "YEARLY".
        java.lang.Integer frequencyPeriod
        Period of frequency of payment for the plan. Example: if the frequency is weekly, and periodFrequency is 2, then the subscription is billed bi-weekly.
        java.lang.String name
        Name describing subscription
        java.lang.String plan
        The ID of the plan that should be used for the subscription.
        java.lang.Integer quantity
        Quantity of the plan for the subscription. [min value: 1]
        java.lang.Integer renewalReminderLeadDays
        If set, how many days before the next billing cycle that a renewal reminder is sent to the customer. If null, then no emails are sent. Minimum value is 7 if set.
        Returns:
        a Subscription object.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException

        Returns:
        a ResourceList object which holds the list of Subscription objects and the total number of Subscription objects available.

      • list

        public static ResourceList<Subscription> list(java.util.Map criteria)
                                       throws ApiCommunicationException,
                                              AuthenticationException,
                                              InvalidRequestException,
                                              NotAllowedException,
                                              SystemException
        Retrieve Subscription objects using the specified criteria and using the static properties PaymentsApi.PUBLIC_KEY and PaymentsApi.PRIVATE_KEY as the default public and private API keys respectively.
        Parameters:
        criteria - a map of parameters; valid keys and types are:
        java.util.Map filter
        filter.customerFilter by the Id of the customer with the subscription
        filter.planFilter by the Id of the plan linked to the subscription
        filter.dateCreatedMin*Filter by the minimum created date you are searching for - Date in UTC millis
        filter.dateCreatedMax*Filter by the maximum created date you are searching for - Date in UTC millis
        filter.qYou can use this to filter by the Id, the name or the amount of the subscription

        *Use dateCreatedMin with dateCreatedMax in the same filter if you want to search between two created dates
        java.lang.Integer max
        Allows up to a max of 50 list items to return. [min value: 0, max value: 50, default: 20]
        java.lang.Integer offset
        Used in paging of the list. This is the start offset of the page. [min value: 0, default: 0]
        java.util.Map sorting
        Allows for ascending or descending sorting of the list. The value maps properties to the sort direction (either asc for ascending or desc for descending). Sortable properties are: dateCreated id plan .
        Returns:
        a ResourceList object which holds the list of Subscription objects and the total number of Subscription objects available.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException
        See Also:
        ResourceList

      • update

        public Subscription update()
                    throws ApiCommunicationException,
                           AuthenticationException,
                           InvalidRequestException,
                           ObjectNotFoundException,
                           NotAllowedException,
                           SystemException
        Updates an Subscription object. The properties that can be updated:
        • amount
        • billingCycle
        • billingCycleLimit
        • coupon
        • currency
        • frequency
        • frequencyPeriod
        • name
        • plan
        • prorate (required)
        • quantity
        • renewalReminderLeadDays
        Returns:
        a Subscription object.
        Throws:
        ApiCommunicationException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        ObjectNotFoundException
        NotAllowedException
        SystemException
